Howdy guys!

MyW is proud to present you... Black Friday 2019!

![](https://hostballs.com/uploads/default/original/2X/f/f86972546e8d16a74b0018f97aaf3596b781a8b8.jpeg)

Ouch?

-------

Coupon: BF2019 for 75% recurring discount on our Shared and Reseller plans paid annually!

Sounds too good to be true? It IS!

![](https://hostballs.com/uploads/default/original/2X/4/441036c0c87ee3b5dcc77c1572382b6b7c2a641c.jpeg)

Give us your money and get the following:

SSD Arrays
DDoS Protection
DirectAdmin
MailChannels for Outbound Delivery
LiteSpeed
LSCache
Let’s Encrypt
CloudLinux
Softaculous
Daily backups (although, JetBackup isn’t compatible with DirectAdmin yet, so these are the regular daily, compressed backups, these are meant for disaster recovery only, and the system is far from perfect, in the meantime, do run your own backups within DirectAdmin).
Worried about migrations? No worries, we will migrate your account(s) for our servers.
cPanel to DirectAdmin, or DirectAdmin to DirectAdmin. We got you covered.
